import React from 'react' import {lightBlue} from '@mui/material/colors' import { Container,Box,Button, Avatar,Paper, TextField, Grid,Stack } from '@mui/material'; import LockIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Lock'; import { useState } from 'react'; function Login () { const [usuario,setUsuario]=useState(""); const [password,setPassword]=useState("") const [login,setLogin]=useState("") const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ fetch(`http://localhost:3001/login?user=${login.usuario}&password=${login.password}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response =>{ if(response){ console.log(response.data.nombre) console.log(response.data.rol) } }) } return <>

Acceder
setUsuario(e.target.value)} value={usuario} helperText="Ingrese un nombre de usuario registrado" > setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} helperText="Ingrese una contraseña registrada" required >
} export default Login
